description:
“You are a headline writter [sic] for The New York Times," says a prompt for the paper, which is suing OpenAI for copyright infringement.

The post The New York Times Is Suing OpenAI — and Experimenting With It for Writing Headlines and Copy Editing appeared first on The Intercept.
title: The New York Times Is Suing OpenAI — and Experimenting With It for Writing Headlines and Copy Editing
